entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
